name: Flappy Ball - AMAZE 2020
description:
The player controls a ball trying to fly between the rows of platforms without touching them. You have to  get the checkpoints and finish the level. You have to look to the arrows of the platforms.

Ignacio Mª Muñoz Marquez - Programming & Design

Antonio Carpintero García - Art & Design

The alternative controller for AMAZE 2020 , it's a light bulb, that when you grab it, switch off the lights.
